name: Out of This Gourd
description: Funny pumpkin minion that everyone loves Jasper is on a quest for coins from his Overlord, but this quest might put him on the treacherous path of far more low-stakes diplomacy than he bartered for! Out of This Gourd is a short talk-action game from Cro-Iba Arts featuring round about an hour of dialogue and puzzles! Briefly meet and don't get too attached to a decently-sized cast of bit parts! And best of all: a skill tree! Build your Jasper into the Jasper of your dreams by invysting gallantry points into niche proficiencies!
